actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Telecommunication, Consumer Protection and Finance.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Telecommunications, Consumer Protection and Finance

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the effect on our society of the level of violence depicted on television requires more consideration and study.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the relationship between television violence and the distorted view of reality held by heavy television viewers and the correlation between television violence and violent behavior should be further considered and investigated.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the effect on our society of the level of violence depicted on television requires more consideration and study.
